thread.title: NBL Grand Final live: Wildcats v Hawks
thread.title_full: NBL Grand Final live: Wildcats v Hawks

title: NBL Grand Final live: Wildcats v Hawks
text:
Live coverage: NBL Grand Final, Game 1 - Wildcats vs Hawks February 26, 2017 6:18pm by Staff writers Source: FOX SPORTS GAME 1 of the NBL Grand Final is here, and itâ€™s sure to be an exciting affair. 
The Perth Wildcats are aiming for back-to-back championships, while Rob Beveridge will try to lead the Illawarra Hawks over his former team. 
FOLLOW THE ACTION IN OUR LIVE BLOG BELOW! 
Will the Wildcats make the most of home court advantage, or will the Hawks stun the entire league by winning the series opener in Perth? 
ULTIMATE GUIDE TO THE NBL GRAND FINAL SERIES 
The action all takes place in Perth Arena, tipping off at 7pm (AEDT).
